      • writeSolution

                 Puzzle puzzle)
        Writes a set of puzzle configurations to a text file Writes in all top rows \n bottom rows \n ... format
        Parameters:
        rows - An ordered set of rows of the route configurations
        puzzle - The puzzle being written
